welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sibinal, Guatemala! This charming city nestled in the mountains is known for its scenic beauty and rich indigenous culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Sibinal has to offer during your stay. Bienvenidos!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport is a small but modern building with basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coatepeque Airport is a separate building dedicated to handling cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Network name and password can be found on signs throughout the terminal.
